Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html#/.name: productsReceived
Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html#/.abstract: True if products were received from the store, false otherwise.

Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html#/.name: localizedNameForProductWithIdentifier(_:)
Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html#/.abstract: Localized name for product with identifier returned by the store.

Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html#/.name: localizedPriceForProductWithIdentifier(_:)
Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html#/.abstract: Localized price for product with identifier returned by the store.

Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html#/.name: localizedDescriptionForProductWithIdentifier(_:)
Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html#/.abstract: Localized description for product with identifier returned by the store.

Protocols/LocalProductsDataSource.html.name: LocalProductsDataSource
Protocols/LocalProductsDataSource.html.abstract: An instance conforming to LocalProductsDataSource represents a data source of in-app purchase items (products)

Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html.name: StoreProductsDataSource
Protocols/StoreProductsDataSource.html.abstract: An instance conforming to StoreProductsDataSource represents a data source of in-app purchase items (products)

Protocols/PurchasedProductsProtocol.html.name: PurchasedProductsProtocol
Protocols/PurchasedProductsProtocol.html.abstract: An instance conforming to PurchasedProductsProtocol is responsible for keeping information about products that were purchased.

Enums/StoreAccessState.html#/s:FO10VSSto.name: requestingProducts
Enums/StoreAccessState.html#/s:FO10VSSto.abstract: Store access is requesting products from the store.

Enums/StoreAccessState.html#/s:FO10VSSto.name: receivedProducts
Enums/StoreAccessState.html#/s:FO10VSSto.abstract: Store access has received products from the store.

Enums/StoreAccessState.html#/s:FO10VSSto.name: purchaseDeferred
Enums/StoreAccessState.html#/s:FO10VSSto.abstract: Processing product purchase. For more information please check out: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/storekit/skpaymenttransactionstate/1411277-deferred

Enums/StoreAccessState.html.name: StoreAccessState
Enums/StoreAccessState.html.abstract: Represents the current state of Store Access object. This is an extended version of SKPaymentTransactionState.

Classes/StoreAccessObserver.html#/s:C10V.name: EmptyBlock
Classes/StoreAccessObserver.html#/s:C10V.abstract: A block that takes no parameters and returns nothing

Classes/ProductsDataSource.html#/s:FC10V.name: localizedNameForProductAtIndex(_:)
Classes/ProductsDataSource.html#/s:FC10V.abstract: Localized name for product at index. If products received from the store, returns localized name received from the store, otherwise returns name of corresponding local product, localized with NSLocalizedString macro.

Classes/ProductsDataSource.html#/s:FC10V.name: localizedDescriptionForProductAtIndex(_:)
Classes/ProductsDataSource.html#/s:FC10V.abstract: Localized description for product at index. If products received from the store, returns localized description received from the store, otherwise returns description of corresponding local product, localized with NSLocalizedString macro.

Classes/ProductsDataSource.html#/s:FC10V.name: localizedPriceForProductAtIndex(_:)
Classes/ProductsDataSource.html#/s:FC10V.abstract: Localized price for product at index. If products received from the store, returns localized price received from the store, otherwise returns nil.

Classes/StoreAccess.html#/s:C10VSStoreKi.name: PurchaseCompletionBlock
Classes/StoreAccess.html#/s:C10VSStoreKi.abstract: Provides identifier for product that was purchased or restored.

Classes/StoreAccess.html#/s:vC10VSStoreK.name: purchaseCompletionHandler
Classes/StoreAccess.html#/s:vC10VSStoreK.abstract: A closure that is executed when product purchased.

Classes/StoreAccess.html#/s:FC10VSStoreK.name: requestProductsWithIdentifiers(_:)
Classes/StoreAccess.html#/s:FC10VSStoreK.abstract: Starts a request for products with provided identifiers.

Classes/StoreAccess.html.name: StoreAccess
Classes/StoreAccess.html.abstract: StoreAccess is responsible for requesting products from the store, providing information about products by conforming to StoreProductsDataSource, purchasing products and restoring previous purchases.

Classes/ProductsDataSource.html.name: ProductsDataSource
Classes/ProductsDataSource.html.abstract: A ProductsDataSource is responsible for providing actual products data, given LocalProductsDataSource and StoreProductsDataSource objects.

Classes/StoreAccessObserver.html.name: StoreAccessObserver
Classes/StoreAccessObserver.html.abstract: StoreAccessObserver observes StoreAccess state. Client may react to state change of it’s interest by providing handler closure.
